question:
Consider the following statements about Pradhan Mantri Kisan SAMPADA Yojana:
  1. The scheme will be implemented by the Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
  2. The scheme aims to provide effective and seamless backward and forward linkages to farmers produce
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. The scheme will be implemented by Ministry of Food Processing Industries (MoFPI). <u>Second statement is correct</u>. The Pradhan Mantri Kisan SAMPADA Yojna is a new central sector scheme with objective to provide effective and seamless backward and forward linkages to farmers produce. The implementation of PMKSY will result in creation of modern infrastructure with efficient supply chain management from farm gate to retail outlet and give a big boost to the growth of food processing sector in the country.
